import React from 'react' import {Card, CardMedia, CardContent, CardActions, Typography, IconButton, Grid, Container} from '@material-ui/core'; import useStyle from './styles' import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import AddShoppingCartSharpIcon from '@material-ui/icons/AddShoppingCartSharp'; import Product from '../Products/Product/Product'; const SingleProduct = ({product, onAddToCart}) => { const classes= useStyle(); return (
{ setLoading(false); }} src={product.src} alt={product.name} /> {product.name} Price: {product.price} Quantity: {quantity}
) } export default SingleProduct
